Posts.Content: Emilie88 wrote: Wondering if anyone is experiencing the onset of constipation during treatment? During week 3 of my week 5 treatment, this came about, despite no change in my normal diet. I'm also not on any medication and have not started any hormonal treatment yet Dx 10/25/2016, DCIS, Left, <1cm, Stage 0, Grade 2, ER+/PR+ Surgery 12/15/2016 Lumpectomy: Left Surgery 12/29/2016 Lumpectomy: Left Radiation Therapy 4/22/2017 Whole-breast: Breast Log in to post a reply
